title: Create a Product Type
description: Create a @typedef for Product and use it in a function.
instructions: Create a Product typedef with id (number), name (string), price (number), and inStock (boolean). Then use it to type the getProduct function return value.

hints.text: @typedef {Object} Product starts the type definition, then use @property for each field

commonMistakes.consequence: Typedef should be at module level so it can be reused
commonMistakes.correction: Put @typedef at the top of your file, before any functions
